Text.Page:
The mekonaris have argon soldiers in their ranks!

These kalash avengers are mere footsoldiers, but very deadly ones. One must be wary of their immense swords. That crystal edge is keen and almost unbreakable.

Yet, if you destroy them, you may flush out their leader.

Excellent! Now, to find their leader.

Anyone who can stand against those argon soldiers is a credit to the federation, and lucky as well!
